poses.msg_self: You sizzle with energy.
You turn into a butterfly, then return to your normal shape.
poses.msg_others: $n turns into a butterfly, then returns to $s normal shape.

poses.msg_self: Blue sparks fly from your fingers.
Little red lights dance in your eyes.
poses.msg_others: Little red lights dance in $n's eyes.

poses.msg_self: A slimy green monster appears before you and bows.
poses.msg_others: A slimy green monster appears before $n and bows.

poses.msg_self: You turn everybody into a little pink elephant.
poses.msg_others: You are turned into a little pink elephant by $n.

poses.msg_self: A small ball of light dances on your fingertips.
poses.msg_others: A small ball of light dances on $n's fingertips.

poses.msg_self: Smoke and fumes leak from your nostrils.
poses.msg_others: Smoke and fumes leak from $n's nostrils.

poses.msg_self: The light flickers as you rap in magical languages.
poses.msg_others: The light flickers as $n raps in magical languages.

poses.msg_self: Your head disappears.
A fire elemental singes your hair.
The sky changes colour to match your eyes.
poses.msg_others: The sky changes colour to match $n's eyes.

poses.msg_self: The stones dance to your command.
The heavens and grass change colour as you smile.
poses.msg_others: The heavens and grass change colour as $n smiles.

poses.msg_self: Everyone's clothes are transparent, and you are laughing.
poses.msg_others: Your clothes are transparent, and $n is laughing.

poses.msg_self: A black hole swallows you.
The world shimmers in time with your whistling.
poses.msg_others: The world shimmers in time with $n's whistling.

poses.msg_self: You feel very holy.
You nonchalantly turn wine into water.
A halo appears over your head.
You recite words of wisdom.
Deep in prayer, you levitate.
An angel consults you.
Your body glows with an unearthly light.
poses.msg_others: $n's body glows with an unearthly light.

poses.msg_self: A spot light hits you.
Everyone levitates as you pray.
A cool breeze refreshes you.
The sun pierces through the clouds to illuminate you.
poses.msg_others: The sun pierces through the clouds to illuminate $n.

poses.msg_self: The ocean parts before you.
A thunder cloud kneels to you.
The Burning Man speaks to you.
An eye in a pyramid winks at you.
poses.msg_others: An eye in a pyramid winks at $n.

poses.msg_self: Valentine Michael Smith offers you a glass of water.
poses.msg_others: Valentine Michael Smith offers $n a glass of water.

poses.msg_self: The great god Mota gives you a staff.
poses.msg_others: The great god Mota gives $n a staff.

poses.msg_self: You perform a small card trick.
You wiggle your ears alternately.
You nimbly tie yourself into a knot.
You juggle with daggers, apples, and eyeballs.
poses.msg_others: $n juggles with daggers, apples, and eyeballs.

poses.msg_self: You steal the underwear off every person in the room.
poses.msg_others: Your underwear is gone!  $n stole it!

poses.msg_self: The dice roll ... and you win again.
poses.msg_others: The dice roll ... and $n wins again.

poses.msg_self: You count the money in everyone's pockets.
poses.msg_others: Check your money, $n is counting it.

poses.msg_self: You balance a pocket knife on your tongue.
poses.msg_others: $n balances a pocket knife on your tongue.

poses.msg_self: You produce a coin from everyone's ear.
poses.msg_others: $n produces a coin from your ear.

poses.msg_self: You step behind your shadow.
Your eyes dance with greed.
You deftly steal everyone's weapon.
The Grey Mouser buys you a beer.
poses.msg_others: The Grey Mouser buys $n a beer.

poses.msg_self: Everyone's pocket explodes with your fireworks.
Everyone discovers your dagger a centimeter from their eye.
poses.msg_others: You discover $n's dagger a centimeter from your eye.

poses.msg_self: Where did you go?
Click.
You show your bulging muscles.
You crack nuts between your fingers.
You grizzle your teeth and look mean.
You hit your head, and your eyes roll.
Crunch, crunch -- you munch a bottle.
... 98, 99, 100 ... you do pushups.
Arnold Schwarzenegger admires your physique.
Watch your feet, you are juggling granite boulders.
poses.msg_others: Watch your feet, $n is juggling granite boulders.

poses.msg_self: Oomph!  You squeeze water out of a granite boulder.
poses.msg_others: Oomph!  $n squeezes water out of a granite boulder.

poses.msg_self: You pick your teeth with a spear.
Everyone is swept off their foot by your hug.
poses.msg_others: You are swept off your feet by $n's hug.

poses.msg_self: Your karate chop splits a tree.
A strap of your armor breaks over your mighty thews.
poses.msg_others: A strap of $n's armor breaks over $s mighty thews.

poses.msg_self: A boulder cracks at your frown.
Mercenaries arrive to do your bidding.
Four matched Percherons bring in your chariot.
poses.msg_others: Four matched Percherons bring in $n's chariot.

poses.msg_self: Atlas asks you to relieve him.
